name: Croc Boy
description:
The Boy is headed to the cafeteria with his lunch money when he runs into The Bully who takes it from him. Can The Boy find a way to get his money back?

Click to the left of The Boy to suggest moving left, or right to suggest moving right. He might not listen to you, though... and if he gets mad, he won't move at all!

A short, experimental prototype developed in four hours on stream May 15, 2019. (https://twitch.tv/mrjoshuamclean/)

Created for TigerJ(am) #2 with the theme of using The Hero's Journey. Quite a major theme for such a short dev cycle! There is very little to do in this demo, but perhaps a future game will come from the general idea.

Thank you for playing!

Check out the full four-hour dev cycle in the video below.

Watch Croc Boy ~ 4 Hour Game Jam Development for TigerJ(am) #2 from MrJoshuaMcLean on www.twitch.tv
